Instance.description: Situation used to control the behavior of Sims during a fire.

TunableTuple.name: go_back_to_panic_interactions
TunableTuple.description: The interactions to look for when a Sim has routed back on to a lot that is on fire which will cause the Sim to go back into panic mode.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableTuple.name: got_to_safety_interaction
TunableTuple.description: The interaction to look for when a Sim has routed off of the lot and safely escaped the fire.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableTuple.name: got_to_safety_interaction_carried_sim
TunableTuple.display: Got To Safety Interaction Carried Sim
TunableTuple.description: The interaction to look for when a carried Sim has routed off of the lot and safely escaped the fire.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableTuple.name: panic_interaction
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that a sim runs while panicking.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

Tunable.name: save_infant_or_toddler_interaction
Tunable.description: The interaction to push on a Sim to save an infant or toddler from the fire.

Tunable.name: TIME_POST_FIRE_IN_SIM_MINUTES
Tunable.display: Time Post Fire In Sim Minutes
Tunable.description: Number of Sim minutes that the situation can be in the _PostFireState before the situation ends.

Tunable.name: fire_panic_state
Tunable.description: The state while the sim is panicking due to fire.

Tunable.name: fire_safe_state
Tunable.description: The state while the Sim has made it safely away from the fire.

Tunable.name: fire_unaware_state
Tunable.description: The state while the sim is unaware there is a fire on the lot.

Tunable.name: post_fire_state
Tunable.description: The state the Sim is in after the fire has gone out.

Tunable.name: save_infant_or_toddler_state
Tunable.description: The state the Sim is in while they are saving an infant or toddler.

Tunable.name: situation_job
Tunable.description: A reference to the SituationJob used during a fire.
